Features
Quickstart
Documentation
Modules

The no framework
for rapid prototyping.

core.io is a federation of Node.js modules that
focus on development speed.

Getting Started

Latest Release: 0.2.8 (Jun 01, 2017)

Get a quick start with
project generators.

Quickly create new project using dynamic project templates.
Creating templates for new projects is fast and easy.

bash 
$ npm install -g core.io
$ core new myApp
created ./myapp
├── ./myapp/modules
└── ./myapp/models

Read the documentation
to get started.

Next to the documentation, follow tutorials to get started.
